title: Bolt tips

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bolt tips are a members-only item used to create gem-tipped bolts. Bolt tips are made through Fletching skill by cutting gems with chisel. An inventory of 27 gems takes 135 ticks (81 seconds) to cut into bolt tips.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bolt tips

Bolt tips are a members-only item used to create gem-tipped bolts. Bolt tips are made through Fletching skill by cutting gems with chisel. An inventory of 27 gems takes 135 ticks (81 seconds) to cut into bolt tips.

Level Item Materials Experience
(per gem) 		Profit
(per gem) 		GP/XP
11 x12 Opal 1.6 207 129.38
26 x12 Jade 2.4 −247 −102.92
41 x6 Pearl 3.2 228 71.25
41 x24 Pearl 3.2 121 37.81
48 x12 Red topaz 3.9 −113 −28.97
56 x12 Sapphire 4.7 176 37.45
58 x12 Emerald 5.5 183 33.27
63 x12 Ruby 6.3 304 48.25
65 x12 Diamond 7 247 35.29
71 x12 Dragonstone 8.2 −6,644 −810.24
73 x24 Onyx 9.4 −1,736,660 −184,751.06

Amethyst bolt tips are unique in that they have a Crafting requirement to make them instead of a Fletching requirement like other bolt tips. These bolt tips may only be attached to broad bolts to create amethyst broad bolts.

Level Item Materials Experience Profit GP/XP
83 x15 Amethyst 60 −271 −4.52
